purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of all information necessary to support the concept of issues as they are identified, acted upon and resolved.

inscope.li: the description and identification of a problem, concern or issue with actual and typical products and activities, without consequential commitment to change the affected item;
the association of an issue to the thing affected;
the association of an issue to its context;
the association of an issue to the actual activity taking place when the issue was noted;
the association of the issue with the person raising the issue;
the association of the issue to its consequences;
the association of issues with each other;
the record of the date and time that the issue was registered;
the formal verification or confirmation that the issue is valid for further consideration.

outscope.li: The disposition of an issue, or the verification that an issue has been resolved;
The recording of information about a product or activity other than the existence and nature of the issue;
The identification of any changes that may resolve the issue;
The recording or management of any consequential changes to the product or activity.

definition.def: A record of a misgiving, objection, or complaint referred to an appropriate authority that it may be resolved
